mapper.select: select selectionnum, id, storynum, startdate, enddate, finished from myselection where id = #{id} and finished = 'Y' order by enddate desc
select scenenum from selectiondetail where selectionnum = #{selectionNum} order by inputdate

select a.scenenum scenenum, s.storytext1 storytext1, s.storytext2 storytext2 from scene s, (select scenenum from selectiondetail where selectionnum = #{selectionNum} and inputdate = (select max(inputdate) from selectiondetail where selectionNum = #{selectionNum})) a where s.scenenum = a.scenenum
